issue.title: [CF 307] Check Activation Border doesn't work
issue.body:
Check Activation Border is supposed to override stance requirements to force usable states, however despite the fact I see the gold border around overpower and/or revenge on my warrior, the tellmewhen button does not appear unless I am in the proper stance.
